website_summaries.verdict: A high-priced cavitation machine with a cool look and intelligent design.
pros: Made well with a smart design and easy to use interface
Comes with straightforward directions, making it great for at home use
cons: Circular shape and size may make it difficult for some to store
Some users complained of circuit issues

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It has been used about 3 times a week and has been used more than 6 times. The skin changes significantly, the fine lines are reduced, and nasolabial folds are faded. There are two probes, the smaller one is just right for face, the bigger one can be used on the hands and legs, very humanized design. It is very comfortable when using, just like at the beauty salon. My face feels hot and obviously, I can feel the pulling of the skin. Sometimes I will apply a hydrating mask when I finish it. I feel more than comfortable. My face will feel tighter. I'm relatively diligent, so I will stick to use it and expect better results.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Too pricy for a sketchy product.
customer_reviews.text: This is too expensive for product with little information and customer service. I forgot to return within the return window. The other reviews here sound too good to be true... and they are! It heats up alright but the RF part is sketchy. You can find same product under different brand here in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ELAINE GIN

customer_reviews.title: Ask the seller questions
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of using this product I found that it is easy to use - with wonderful results to my skin - I love it. The handle is light weight and glides easily on your skin - there is no drag. It's great to have the ability to select the settings to low med or high. Depending on what you desire. Also having the timer helps so you can evenly distribute the use on your face/body The supplier answered my questions quickly - so no waiting around for a response. The product is exceptional in delivering the results I wanted I would certainly recommend this product to anyone .
customer_reviews.author: MichMer

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was Skeptical about purchasing this item due to the high price point, I’ve done a lot of research about these type Machines and I decided to give it a try, I’ve been looking for a machine to rejuvenate my skin, I am currently experiencing a little bit of Acne issue as well. I got the Machine last week and use it about three times since I had it. I can clearly see my acne issue is better before use. It’s too soon to tell if this will help my skin rejuvenate but I have High hope in this Machine. I will post a follow up review after 1-2 months of using.
customer_reviews.author: Naptune

customer_reviews.title: I made a complaint with the company and they never responded
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen any changes. I would like to return the product, but they never responded to my message. Disappointed. Update: I finally got a response and they allowed me to return to item with a full refund. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Chibiblossoms

customer_reviews.title: Results in a short time period.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this face lifting beauty care machine for my mother. She’s growing older and as she’s aging more wrinkles are appearing on her face so I decided to purchase this for her. She gave it a try and has been using it for a month already and the wrinkles on her face has decreased. She uses it on her cheeks and her neck, it really tightened her skin up. Now she looks younger than the last time I saw her. It works wonders. I’m going to order another one for myself now.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This item doesn’t work. Even the pamphlet that is in the package is written wrong clearly due to it being from Hong Kong. This is a fraud and expensive and I want a refund. It’s warm, but doesn’t do the job to tighten skin and especially for the cost of this thing. Do not waste your hard earned money
customer_reviews.author: Lori P.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This skin care beauty device is well packaged,I bought it for my wife as gift.the results are good,even better then my wife past professional microdermabrasion,it is easy to use and there are many helpful video on YouTube,it’s been more then a month now, she uses it 2 times a week and likes it so much
customer_reviews.author: Hew

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the results I got using this machine. My face feels smoother and more taught. The customer support is very good as they answered my questions very quickly. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Save money and times!
customer_reviews.text: I am a sunny and smiling girl,that's why the fine lines come early on my face. I like to watch drama until late night,the dark circles around my eyes are getting very serious.Recommended from my friend that rather than pay for expensive beauty spa visiting,I have better to get my own beauty machine and here it comes.I had used about a month now .I could feel my skin getting tighten and smoothly.The fine lines and dark circles are obviously reduced.It got three different levels of speeds and I am on step one .I put on a facial mask after each time I uesd.I will be moving forward on level two to see a better result now.
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah Miller

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent temperature.
customer_reviews.text: My first machine had a malfunction which made the machine stopped working in less than 4 uses. I contact the seller and they had replaced it for me with a new machine. So far the new machine haven’t shut down on me but I feel as if the heat isn’t consistent. When it does work and heats up hot at setting 3 then I love it, but when it’s has it moments when even at setting number 3 it would feel like setting 2 or even 1. Kinda disappointing because the price of the machine isn’t that cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Best device in terms of at-home technolgy
customer_reviews.text: After researching anti-aging devices for a few months, I've decided that this machine is worth my investment. Ive only used it once but im happy that it comes with a warranty-type thing on it for one year. The booklet it comes with gives detailed directions and also there is a guy on Youtube named TJ that has great side-by-side results of his face before and after his at-home Radiofrequency treatments. Also! I studied Anatomy and Physiology in college so i can tell you with certainty that this machine will have more lasting results than with a microneedle or with any kind of electrical stimulation (tria, nu face) or colored lights therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie_GP

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: Use this machine to make my skin firmer.After use, it is easier to absorb with other skin care products.I really like it
customer_reviews.author: zoey

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the spa
customer_reviews.text: So far I've been seeing results. I've only had the opportunity to use it on 2 clients and both have shown improved results. My client is 9 months postpartum and has wrinkles and stretch marks. After 3 treatments we saw a reduction in the wrinkles and also her stretch marks which I did not expect.
customer_reviews.author: Island Drip LLC

customer_reviews.title: firm and smooth skin.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very skeptical about this product at first. I'm in my early 20s and of course haven't experienced any aging symptoms yet. But I do have acne , redness, large pore.. I'm not sure if this divide is for me because im not aging yet but I heard the radio fm frequency can help stimulate the production of collagen and burn fat on the face so I gave this divide a try. Results so far is i can feel my skin is smoother and firmer but I hadn't noticed any significant change yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ng

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good product, I had stretch marks done and was fascinated to see an improvement of the depth and color of them .
customer_reviews.author: Cuiyun

customer_reviews.title: Product falure
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in April 2019, it stopped working August 2019, and returns stopped in May for the product. Expensive and only worked for 3 months. Angry!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This device works just as I expected. It's a great option for removing wrinkles and lifting skin. I was surprised that my facial wrinkles has been visibly flattened and reduced after 10 minutes of usage. It works like ironing clothes, with the heat and weight of the iron, the wrinkles are stretched and smoothed out from the fabric, so does the skin. There are two probes that depend on your needs. While other reviewers use the small probe for face, I found the big one is even better for facial lifting and also good for massaging the loose tummy and arms. It saves me lots of money going to beauty salon. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JD.W

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a radio beauty device to help my business. I order this one about one month ago. WOW awesome! I tried it for a few my clients. They are very happy with the results. Not only the skin is tighter but the wrinkles are definitely less! The machine came in a very good package, nothing missing nothing damaged! Easy use and clean. Has 2 different size attachments so it can work on different area of the body. It helps me to increase my business a lot. I am so glad I did buy this one. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rizalito Santos

customer_reviews.title: Florida Sun Damage
customer_reviews.text: Man I was excited to finally get this! With COVID here in FL there's nothing to do but lay in the sun. I've always tanned well, never had issues with skin. But I went a little too hard this summer and now see some significant changes. I'm only a week into use but I can feel and see a difference, skin firming back up, feels softer and less leathery. We will see if this is temporary or not... But even if I have to use this every day I still don't think it was a bad investment. Saves you from all the money and time wasted at a dermatologist or spa... Just doesn't feel as good as the spa lol.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: The skin became red and swollen, terrible quality, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning it was ok, but later the skin became red and swollen! Plastic smell became even worse than when I unpacked it. Worst product ever, please don't buy. Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ilona Starchak

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I am looking for a beauty device for my skin.then I bought this one which comes up with a DVD and soothing facial gel,along with three magical options. When I use I can see my skin looking smoother and Britten .i recommend this device for a brighter
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this RF radio device for my girlfriend! Lately she has been saying she has too many wrinkle around her eyes even though I think she is gorgeous! But anyway I still searched around and got this machine for her to make her happy! As soon as she received it she used it . Very easy to use and I helped her to do around her eyes and face. It is a little warm while the machine works which is very comfortable. After a few times using I do see there is a different on her face. Wrinkles definitely less and skin is smoother and shiner! She is very happy! I am glad I did it for her!
customer_reviews.author: José Valle

customer_reviews.title: New Unit Seems to Work
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with my first unit. The customer service was amazing and I think it is working. I don't have pictures to provide yet. However - the customer service team was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jtmoore

customer_reviews.title: Defective won't power on
customer_reviews.text: Received today. Defective will not power on. Seriously, you charge that much for something and you don't quality check the item before you ship it? I'm getting a replacement only because my Aesthetician recommends RFD therapy. Will update this review if the next one will actually power up. If not I'll relate that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This radio frequency skin tightening offers the non-surgical, anti-aging, wrinkle removing. I decided to buy this beauty instrument because I have seen the introduction of this product on other websites, which is relatively reliable. This beauty instrument is no side effects and dermis skin temperature is safe. It could do some anti-aging, wrinkle removing treatment, and I have tried it is totally painless. It triggers my skin's own healing process. I can control my beauty and get the same quality treatment as beauty salon directly at home. The important thing it is offers 60 days money back and 1 year warranty service. I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Liu

customer_reviews.title: Good results
customer_reviews.text: I got this machine to use primarily on my abdomen skin. After second pregnancy, the skin on my stomach looks a bit stretched. After 6 times of use, i can see some improvement. Skin starting to look much happier. I tried it on my face as well, dont see significant results just yet. Given that its working on my stomach skin, I will keep on using it on my face to to hopefully get visible improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Elvi

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been hesitant when it comes to products like this. I just didn’t feel comfortable using something like this on my face unless it’s done by a professional. That, or this may just be another gimmick. My friend ordered this machine and raved the results, and that was enough for me to make this purchase. I began by watching a bunch of youtube videos before using this device (that eased my fear). My main point of concern are the dark circles under my eyes. I haven’t used this device long enough to see a distinct difference, but the texture of my skin feels a little bit smoother than before.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Made a difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter because shes been reading a lot about lasers and her birthday was coming up. It came nicely packaged & of quality. I didn't expect much in the way of results. This is a before and after with just 1 month of use. I'm definitely going to be trying it on a scar and wrinkles sometime in the future. I would recommend this item & happy I was pushed into buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed, it works great on my skins!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several facial lifting stuff, like bar, roller , and this is the best result I have suffered. Very simple to use, no need to read the instructions and maintenance manual. When I using it, I can feel the radio frequency total working on my face, first time, I tried 10 minutes on my left face, then compared with right face that not ready, I find lift total on my left face, very excited and was surprised.i will continue to use it to see the best result, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond E.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Time fly. I didn’t realized how fast the time goes by, but I saw wrinkles come around. I’m afraid to be old. I want to try my best to keep me in the best shape. I ordered the RF radio lifting machine, which stated it can reduce my wrinkle. I have been using for couple weeks, and I notice my wrinkle get lighter. Yet the wrinkle didn’t go away. I will keep trying to use it. And wish it could help me keep young forever.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price tag sway you to a cheaper product.
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife have been using this unit for about a week not and it is honestly one of the best things we have invested into. We have cut out an expense by getting this machine and it seems to be of very high build quality and giving the same results as professional treatment. This item alone is going to save us thousands of dollars in just a few months of using it. If you are on the fence about purchase and thinking about buying a cheaper or maybe even a more expensive unit save yourself the hassle and get something is going to give you what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Romero

customer_reviews.title: Wife gives it two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is very happy with the purchase, her skin does appear to be tighter since using. She has been using it 2-3 times a week. Around her eye area is where she noticed it the most. For the price the machine is a great alternative to things that can harm you like Botox. Comes with two heads one for body areas and a smaller one that’s for the face. It also comes with the cream to allow the machine to move across your face with ease. Very happy and would recommend to anyone who wanted results at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Nycinpolk

customer_reviews.title: Good home alternative for cellulite and wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that can be used at home for a reasonable price. I’ve been using this for almost 2 weeks on my legs and face and I can see that my skin getting smothered. No wrinkles are not gone yet but seems like it’s working in the right direction. It has to 2 heads that you can use. I use small one on my face and big one on my legs. Very compact size and easy to use. I am light skin and in my 40th it comes with instructions manual and one Small tube of gel.
customer_reviews.author: Tetyana

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I am blown away!
customer_reviews.text: I received the RF face lift machine quickly . It was super easy to use . After one treatment I am speechless! Instant results ! Skin is tighter , wrinkles minimized .... I am really amazed and blown away! I’m approaching 40 and noticed some aging and sagging of my skin. I am beyond pleased with this product after one, single use.
customer_reviews.author: Cool

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use and works on my skin!
customer_reviews.text: This radio frequency skin lifting machine is easy to use. The instruction on the manual booklet shows clearly how to use this device. I have been using this device for one month and my friend told me my skin looks better than before!I'm so glad! You need to use the conductive gel to feel the heat. There is one tube of conductive gel included and you can get more at stores after you finish it. Overall, very easy to use and works on my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Be diligent about using it on a regular basis.  Don’t think results will be immediate.
customer_reviews.text: This works - slowly but the results are becoming obvious. My skin looks smoother, and lighter. I love how my face looks and feels after each 30 minute treatment. I’ve only been using the machine for two weeks but can already see and feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. looper

customer_reviews.title: Convenient skincare device at home!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is so powerful! I can feel the heat of the probe as it glides across my skin. It’s very important to use a generous amount of RF gel beforehand. Luckily, a bottle of gel comes with package, which is convenient. As I understand, it’s better to use this device often, but not to exceed 3 times a week to get optimal result. After the treatment, I massage with some serum to help my skin heal better. Slowly, I feel my skin looks tighter and smoother. In conclusion, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm someone who gets professional RF treatments to keep my skin healthy, so I definitely get picky about my skin care. I wasn't sure about the Lyft, but got it on the recommendation of a friend to try - I was pleasantly surprised with result, as it seemed to make a big difference on my face. It also seemed to make my toner/lotion combo absorb really nicely into my skin. I like the quality and price
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Very good beauty instrument
customer_reviews.text: Since last year, because of more fine lines and wrinkles, I started to take care more of my skin than I used to. My best friend advised me to buy a face lifting device which is proven to help skin elasticity and enhances skin health. I don’t want to spend much money on beauty salon. So this home use beauty machine becomes my best choice. after 20 days using, I can see the difference, my face looks shinier, toned. So far I’m using it two or three times per week. This machine does take time to get the visible result, it isn’t a magic wand however I think this rf machine is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Hui x.

customer_reviews.title: Home Spa
customer_reviews.text: Thermage in the spa or facial center costs alot, and they were only few treatments. I am currently using this 3 times a week, from level 1 and 10 mins to level 2 and 10 mins. The probe won't hurt your skin, it becomes warm and hot if you stayed in one place for too long, but the product comes with the relieve and repairing gel to cool your skin so your skin doesn't become too dry. Gel used up pretty fast, but there are always replacements you can get. I can see my lines are smoother. This is an investment that is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: yzzzzz

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly give out reviews but this one is worth mentioning. I’m in my 30’s..Have been using it past a week (2 sessions).. Can’t believe it has already made a drastic improvement to my glow, pores look minimized & not a single breakout.. I’m yet to notice the tightening effect after few more sessions. Amazing customer service, prompt response & addresses your issues with ease.
customer_reviews.author: HA

customer_reviews.title: I really like it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this machine. I have been used for several times. And I can tell the difference already. Life is not easy for me, being a mom of 2 kids. Life is so stressed. I m so young but have already full of wrinkle. I don’t want wrinkle got worse. I found this machine and saw a lot of good reviews. After using 4-5 times. I can feel my wrinkle get less and lighter. It is really helpful. You don’t need to do anything else. Just relax and massagers. Nice to have. I want to suggest other moms to try this, it will make your next day brighter and brighter
customer_reviews.author: SPHERE

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product 2 weeks ago and it helps tone and moisturized my skin. Use a lot of lotion and it's very relaxing to use! It felt like a heated massage! It is convenient and compact, easy for home use, can enjoy beauty salon care at home. I have to say that the skin feels firm, wrinkles remove, skin rejuvenated. So far I'm satisfied with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Silly Shark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to surprise my wife for our anniversary. She was asking for me to schedule an appointment at the doctors for her skin and I thought we could save some money and I did some research and found tightening machine. She was hesitant at first until she gave it a try. The instructions and ease of use it amazing here. It was easy to use and apply. It’s only been a week so far but she feels great and has mentioned how she feels she is glowing. I would recommend this for someone looking for an easy to use skin tightening machine whether it’s a gift or for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Rami Odeh

customer_reviews.title: Seeing Results Already
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a couple times a week for almost two weeks now and can see results in my forehead! My lines have not disappeared but they have diminished enough to encourage me to continue using it. I recommend spacing out the treatments at least 3 or 4 days, especially on your face. Mine got a little sensitive. Using a jade roller and applying Vitimin C serum afterwards helps too.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: If you have a lot of time and patience then this is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I tried several styles and in the end returned them mostly because of lack of easy to understand and thorough instructions and also the length of time required on each body part. Would take hours to do several parts. In the end this brand delivered the best results in the short period I used it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Change life
customer_reviews.text: I used it for 3 times before review it, everytime I did have to use a gel across my face(which comes with the machine). I can easily sit in sofa and listen to music and use this. I can do it at the 2rd energy level for about 20 minutes. So far I can tell after use that it tightens the skin. Especially, the next day my skin does feel tighter. So, this home use beauty device match my expectation. Granted, I am not a professional and it does take me some time to learn how to use it correctly. However, once I get used to this Mlay device, it is very easy to use and very enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: No visible results
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times, absolutely no results on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: SBJ

customer_reviews.title: The people have some skins problem cancer and other issues
customer_reviews.text: I am so sorry I didn’t not use the product because when I read the introduction I found out that people with tiroides cancer they sure not use and unfortunately that is my case I wish they will put this instructions before you purchase sorry 😐
customer_reviews.author: Julieta Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Love it!thank you
customer_reviews.text: This beauty device with high quality and produces instant radiant results. Very effective and easy to use. I'm very pleased with the workmanship and value in comparison to other devices on the market. My skin feels fresh and rejuvenated every time I use it. I am going to continue to use it because good nutrition intake is very important to fight the facts of aging. I think it is definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: lesley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this machine! We have had a very good experience with MLAY and the RF Radio Frequency Facial And Body Skin Tightening Machine. Although we had a minor issue within the warranty period a simple email to MLAY and they resolved the issue immediately without argument. I would not hesitate to purchase from MLAY again they are an solid example to the way Customer Service should be done. Good job MLAY !
customer_reviews.author: Eric in Florida

customer_reviews.title: MLAF RF  Radio Frequency
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how well this little machine delivers. I had one treatment done professionally and this is comparable for a fraction of the price. Not to mention it is available to you any time when you need it. My jawline and neck are tighter and smoother. The biggest surprise was the tummy area, that stubborn muffin top is 3/4 gone after only four10-minute on the lowest setting. Ladies this little machine really delivers.
customer_reviews.author: D.F.F.

customer_reviews.title: good for man too
customer_reviews.text: as a 35 years old man, I think we really need to catch times and take well care of ourself, I did some research over internet before I make this purchase, I am now so glad I did. I owned this beauty machine almost 4 weeks now, it really helps on my situation, now my skin turns much smoother and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Z

customer_reviews.title: Tighter skin
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use!!!! Skin turns to be smoother after first use. And you actually feels it turns tighter right away. I‘be been using it everyday for couple days but only 2mins or so after putting on the serum. I somehow feel like the serum can be absorbed better with the heat and frequency.
customer_reviews.author: Stephy

customer_reviews.title: easy to use. worth it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't write a review right away unless I tried the product for a long time. it's been almost a month now. I can see the difference in my skin. it helps to tone and moisturized my skin. I have very sensitive skin. this machine didn't make me uncomfortable while other machines make the skin itchy and dry. The best thing is making my pore less noticeable. highly recommend. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Z

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This thing isn’t worth your money. It doesn’t work right and it warms up intermittently.
customer_reviews.author: Isela Morales

customer_reviews.title: Better then I though!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try MLAY RF Radio Facial and Body skin thingtening machine before I reviewed it. I have tried it on the face and cellulite areas. I love the feeling after using it the skin feels smoother. I have noticed to have better effect use it after bath. I have used with rose oil and tea tree oil. Defenetly worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far!!
customer_reviews.text: Love using this product, and I think it has already started working after just a few uses. My skin is glowing more and some lines are smaller as well 🤗 Unfortunately I can’t use it during the next 7 months due to pregnancy, but I can’t wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: I.Lobben

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews from other buyers, I purchased this machine. It's convenient to use at home. I saw visible changes on my face after 2 weeks. This definitely saved me time and money from going to the beauty salons.
customer_reviews.author: Santi

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this skin beauty device. It's very easy to operate, put some gel on the treatment area, and move the probe. I usually use this at night after showering. And use for every other night for 15 minutes. I have seen some improvement in the tone and smoothness of skin around my legs and my body.
customer_reviews.author: James Quincey

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product . There was a problem with it and I was very pleased to see that the seller replaced it with a new that works well. Thank you for the great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have beennused this device about a week and it worked great. I was skeptical at first, but the result speak for itself. I use it almost every day to tone my skin. I can feel the difference. I had a bit of loose skin after maternity that i have not able to get rid of. My chin and cheeks are visibility toner and I can’t wait what the results would be like after a month of using it.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this, safe your life!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this item for a little while, and it’s absolutely don’t help, even though it makes my skin feel bad, red spots on my skin after using it. Also smell of plastic when it on, means not good for your health. Don’t buy this item, SAFE YOUR LIFE
customer_reviews.author: Kirill

customer_reviews.title: Ake your face warm.
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a gel. It makes the face feel warm and relax, bring the blood circulation in face. It is made of good materials. Ot works with microwaves.
customer_reviews.author: Z.R

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this a while now and have noticed many good results. To me it has been worth the investment. Would recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great anti-aging machine
customer_reviews.text: This skin tightening machine does wonders! I really enjoy using this because the warmth makes your skin feel so good. After a few uses, I could already see a difference in my skin. My fine lines have faded. This could be temporarily but I believe if I continue to use it it will benefit me in the long run. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Miller

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I just got the machine and tried it for the first time. So impressed, visible result with just my first treatment. Just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: This is great!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is very good and it’s great at what it’s supposed to do. I used to go to the store to get my face done, but after I bought this, I don’t have to go to the store anymore. I love this and I highly recommend people to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: does not work when try to return could not return....
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it several times not sure if it’s working. My skin looks exactly the same so far .it may not show results right away, but maybe in the near future it will.
customer_reviews.author: Lou B

customer_reviews.title: Face probe
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s ok but i am missing the face probe; please send me
customer_reviews.author: path math

customer_reviews.title: Excited to see more
customer_reviews.text: I have used this device three times and I am already noticing improvements in my skin with wrinkles/lax skin. I’m so excited to see results after several more treatments. Very easy to use, nice looking device, glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry S.

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: This RF home unit is very easy to use, it is much more convenient than going to spa. After 4 weeks uses, it seems to give good results! My skin becomes more bright and smooth, that is just want I want!
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: It works on my wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for 2 weeks, I have noticed visible changes in the wrinkles and it does make my face feel smoother. I would definitely recommend this home use beauty item to my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great beauty machine
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a face lifting machine recommended by my friend.Got this machine over three weeks now, use three times a week on my face.it’s terrific, my skin getting tighter and smoother .It is very easy to use, It’s better to use with the gel which comes with the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Libing

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: Love this face lifting tool! It's easy to understand the user manual and easy to use, it makes my skin feel instantly tighter. Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL !!
customer_reviews.text: I have used my Mlay twice, and each time I have seen a difference. I used it on my face and hands. At first, I really had to think about buying because it is pricey but, I absolutely love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It works!!!! After only 3 sessions I can see a difference on my inner thighs!!!! And if you drink lots of water and don’t eat too many carbs, you’ll see results faster than expected!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: I only had the chance to try it twice, and so far I see it is very easy to use and works properly. I’m waiting a few more times to start seeing the results.

customer_reviews.title: The right device for our wives.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my wife for her Birthday, was very happy, uses it constantly, says that it is very effective. I think that this device should be in every home, so that the wives were as young and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Smit

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Hopefully it will last for a few years. A little pricey but can do RF at home more often than at esthetician's.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is a very expensive heating tool. I used it three times a day over the course of course of a month and saw no improvement. I have no wrinkles but some sagging skin and this did nothing! It is supposed to tighten sagging skin but did not. Notice the pictures presented in the refuse. The one middle-aged women shows really no significant improvement and the girl with the nasolabial fold on just one side, which is unusual, could have had that easily corrected with filler. Just my humble opinion.
customer_reviews.author: debbie c

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me :(
customer_reviews.text: As a lady of a "certain age," I'm starting to sag and wrinkle. It arrived quickly, looks well made. Used it 2 to 3 time a week on high 20 minutes a time didn't really feel much of anything. Did not see any difference after one month of use. Probably would have kept at it but for the price and the 30-day return policy, sent it back, to bad had really really hoped it would do something, guess I'm looking at a facelift in a few years :( sounded too good to be true. BTW they show a young girl using it, why would a young person bother using this?
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Broke, and replaced, after 6 weeks (UPDATED)
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: I raised my rating to 4 stars. The seller responded quickly when contacted adn sent me a replacement unit, although that took a little while to arrive. The replacement has been working fine (knock on wood). ORIGINAL REVIEW: It broke after 6 weeks. I used it approximately two to three times a weeks for 20 minutes each session. No significant difference in skin tone or firmness is identified. Now the probe stops generating heat. In addition, the instructions are poorly written with numerous grammatical errors.
customer_reviews.author: For Real

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Know that radio frequency has many uses in medical offices, including my own. Was skeptical about this , but it works. It works amazingly well, very quickly. I tell folks to expect 4 months for results, have seen them much more quickly. Very happy with this , and would recommend. Be careful, it can get VERY HOT
customer_reviews.author: lunker76

customer_reviews.title: Save you money
customer_reviews.text: The instrument is better than I expected. I used to do it once in the beauty salon. Because the price is more expensive. The principle of this instrument and the beauty salon is the same. Maybe it is because the skin is dry and staying up After used, the skin feels a little bit tingling. After a few times, I found that the Nasolabial folds became lighter. So I will stick to.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this face lifting device for my mother birthday. She always complain her skin on her face has so many wrinkles. So my friend recommended this machine to me. I did 3 treatment on her so far. The improvement is huge. Her skin is tighter. Wrinkles are less. I used it on her neck too. It is really amazing how the results came out. Her skin is so much brighter, softer And shiner. It last many days. She is so happy. I am glad I bought this machine!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Professional machine
customer_reviews.text: There are 2 probes for this machine, one for face, the other one for the body using. My wife like this when she first saw it a couple days ago. It looks very professional, I am glad to buy it to make her happy. About the effect of the application is too early to report, I will update after 2 months. Everything is fine so far!
customer_reviews.author: Memo Sukar

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it I was weary of it as I was when I purchased it. However, the results are promising I believe it’s defiantly worth the money. It’s quite effective and it excelled beyond my expectation for it because it used radio frequencies which I am not quite familiar with. But after doing some research I was pleased and made the purchase and. it proved to be effective. I have used it a couple of times and it already has shown its effectiveness, my skin becomes smoother and tightener. I would definitely recommend this product as it is priced at a good point and it proves effective in my experience!
customer_reviews.author: KLeeAllen

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This home use skin beauty device is a good product. I like it very much! I have been using it for about 20 days since I received it. The effect is very obvious, I feel that my acne marks have become lighter, and wrinkles have been smoothed out, especially the fat lines on my neck, I nearly can't believe it when I compare with the picture I took one year ago ...... I am looking forward to a better result. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Decent but needs some improvement.
customer_reviews.text: I do feel my face and body is toner when using this. I've been using it for a few weeks however the light button for the level 3 is burnt or no longer shines. For a over a $300 machine I don't expect it to not work after 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Girl Next Door

customer_reviews.title: it really works!
customer_reviews.text: I am a receptionist and have to look more pretty , I am searching for beauty products for a long time , then I found that , a lot of people talking about much positive about this device and I decided to purchase it, and yes I make a good decision as I am using this device for 20 days and it gives my skin a soft hot touch with tightening and glowing , my wrinkles started to disappear and all yellow spots also gone slowly from my skin , this device makes me look younger , I love it and recommend to woman who cares for her skin...
customer_reviews.author: Michover Hcim

customer_reviews.title: Breakout and duration
customer_reviews.text: I just started using it 2weeks ago and I use it 3times a week and only on my neck and face. I use the lowest settings , but I've noticed my skin is breaking out and I find it very time consuming. I'm hoping I will be able to reduce the time to 2 a week then 1 , ten years every other week . Then monthly for maintenance., at that time my settings will be higher an longer. I can see tightening , but I'm concerned about the breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Salemme

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Since first use I could see improvements. My skin was lifted and some of my lines were gone. I have been using this 3 weeks. It works on my face as it described. I don't like the gel primer comes with it, replacing with my Nuface gel primer. This machine works better than my Nuface Trinity. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Gel can be replaced by serum or lotion
customer_reviews.text: I planted a seed to buy this product when I saw a similar product in the mall. This is expensive and I was hesitated and afraid it was a waste. However, after 7 weeks of use, I feel my face is smooth and radiant. The gel is almost gone. I searched online and the gel can be replaced by the serum or lotion. This problem is easily solved and I don't need to buy the extra gel.
customer_reviews.author: relax & smile

customer_reviews.title: Very worth buying
customer_reviews.text: After receiving it, I can’t wait to open it and use it. The touch of the massage face is very warm, I can feel the slight current, and it is a very comfortable massage. I used it for the first time for 10 minutes, and I have been massaging the nasolabial folds. I feel that the massage area is a bit red, very warm and still feels very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Niu jing qiao

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: First one was defective, didn't get warm. A replacement was sent and it's awesome! I've used rf treatments in medspas and this feels the same! Too early to see results but I have high hopes!
customer_reviews.author: sydney

customer_reviews.title: Professional Quality build
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Professional quality. This is my after 1 use picture. It gives a warming feeling. It’s very soothing. I will use this 3-4 times per week because I have extremely dry skin. It made me feel good and my husband even liked it. Facial at home for couples too ; D
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good size to put away when not using. Super easy to use. Used it for the first time and I love the concept of what it does. Cannot wait time post before and after pictures. Not sure how many uses it takes to see results but I will be updating this post soon! Super excited
customer_reviews.author: Mel

product_meta.title: MLAY RF Radio Frequency Facial And Body Skin Tightening Machine - Professional Home RF Lifting Skin Care Anti Aging Device - Salon Effects
feature_bullets: EFFECTIVE SKIN TIGHTENING DEVICE: MLAY RF skin tightening machine use the latest bipolar RF technology, with output frequency 1.0 MHz, power 50watts, it transfers most RF energy to your dermis skin, effectively stimulates collagen and elastin production

SAFEST RF SKIN TIGHTENING AND LIFTING DEVICE: the RF triggers the skin's own healing process to produce elastic fiber, collagen, no side effects. The built intelligent temperature control chip makes sure our surface skin and dermis skin temperature is safe

PAINLESS WITH LONG LASTING RESULTS: MLAY radio frequency skin tightening offers the non-surgical, anti-aging, wrinkle removing treatment, and it is totally painless. It triggers your skin's own healing process, so the skin lift you get will last longer

VISIBLE RESULTS IN AVERAGE 45 DAYS! Results from 50,000 customers aged between 25 and 70 from cooperative beauty salon show that 73.3% of them saw visible facial skin improvements in only 2-4 weeks. 12.6% of them saw visible results within 60 days

AT HOME PROFESSIONAL BODY AND FACE MACHINE: Now you can get the same quality treatment as beauty salon directly at home. Give you a chance to renew your skin now, you can control your beauty. MLAY offers 60 days money back and 1 year warranty service
